name: Violet's Inferno: Subtitle Here
description:
Help a game developer save her half-baked disaster project from a Face Demon in a chaotic comedy game!

Violet's latest game project is the [insert a strong, positive adjective here] game ever!  Or at least it would be if Violet's own face didn't gain sentience and decide to sabotage her project.  Journey through the different aspects of Violet's barely functional game world before the Face Demon can ruin her game and reputation!

Featuring:

  • Full Voice Acting!
  • Walking!
  • A lot of cubes!
  • Secret baby jail!

(Content Warning: flashing lights, hyperbolic cartoon violence/blood/gore, food)
